long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change background of your google default screen.Update your google white background with your favourite background images. Install extension and open www.google.com you will see background image instead of default white/blank background, you can also choose more images click on MyBG icon and select image of your choice.
